title: Where Modern City Living Reaches New Heights!
posting_body: ['LIV @ University I', 'Property Address', '4265 S Bruce St, ,', 'Las Vegas, NV, 89119', '<URL>', 'Take advantage of relaxed living in a great location with our deals on 1 bed 1 bath apartments.', 'With rents as low as $1,250.00, these spacious 610 Sq.', "Ft. square foot floor plans won't be available for long.", 'Call or stop by today!', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 1 BR Full Reno', '1 Bedrooms / 1 Bathrooms', '610 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$1,250.00', 'Community Amenities', 'Swimming Pool', 'Laundry Facility', 'On-site Maintenance', 'Smoke-Free Apartments', 'Property Manager On-Site', '24-Hour Availability', 'Courtyard', 'Gated Access', 'Garden-Style Landscape', 'Bark Park', 'Social Areas with BBQ Grills', 'Online Services', 'Picnic Area', 'Pet Policy', 'We accept your furry family members.', 'Dogs and cats, up to two pets per household, are welcome.', 'Dog weight limit of 25 lbs at full grown size.', '$250 pet fee per pet and $25 per month pet rent per pet.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday 8:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M.', 'Wednesday 8:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M.', 'Friday 8:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M.', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
